availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Major (Frankfort, Kentucky, state printer)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, state printer. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel J. M. Major and Martha H. Major. Clerk in Frankfort in 1860. State printer of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1857 to 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, District 2, p. 80.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, District 1, p. 80.
Journal of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky (Frankfort, Ky.: A. G. Hodges, State Printer, 1857), 278-279.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861,” in 1862 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862).
